name: Keyboard Only User

male.name: Kevin
male.background: Has RSI that makes mouse use painful. Switched to keyboard-only navigation. Power user who knows all the shortcuts but frustrated when sites don't support them.

female.name: Angela
female.background: Has limited hand mobility from arthritis. Uses keyboard with one hand and assistive technology. Efficient but needs sites to be keyboard-accessible.

neutral.name: Jamie
neutral.background: Quadriplegic who uses mouth stick and sip-and-puff technology. Every unnecessary keystroke is exhausting. Values efficiency and proper focus management.

expressions: Tab, tab, tab... where's the focus?
I can't see where I am on this page.
This focus indicator is almost invisible.
I'm stuck in this dropdown - it's a focus trap.
Why can't I activate this with Enter?
Space should toggle this, not Enter.
I had to tab through 50 elements to get here.
Finally, a site with good keyboard support.
This custom widget doesn't respond to arrow keys.
Where did my focus go after that action?

frustrationTriggers: invisible or barely visible focus indicators
focus traps in modals or widgets
too many tabs to reach main content
positiveReactions: focus returns to trigger after modal close
typicalBehaviors: First tests: Can I see focus indicator?
Tabs through entire page to check order
Tests all interactive elements with Enter/Space
Checks if arrow keys work in menus/tabs
Notes when focus is lost or jumps unexpectedly
Knows immediately when custom widgets lack keyboard support

keyboardExpectations.ArrowKeys: Navigate within menus, tabs, radio groups
keyboardExpectations.Home/End: Jump to first/last item in lists

accessibilityChecks.focus: 2.4.7 Focus Visible - clear indicator on all elements
accessibilityChecks.noTrap: 2.1.2 No Keyboard Trap - can always escape
